name: FACEPONG
description:
FACEPONG

Play through five chaotic levels of this Quadrapong (Atari, 1974) remake!

I made FACEPONG in one month as part of a personal challenge to release a new game every month. If you're interested in the next games I release, drop your email here and I'll reach out when the next game is released. I also wrote about what I learned making it.

Controls - Keyboard

  • Left & Right: A & D or Left Arrow & Right Arrow
  • Serve: S
  • Pause: Q or Esc
  • Back to Previous Menu: Q or Esc
  • Menu Accept: Enter

Additional Credits

  • Made in Godot Engine 3.3.2
  • All art assets from Kenney's 1-Bit Pack
  • Sound effects made using ChipTone
  • CRT Shader
  • Font used is ZX Spectrum from Dafont
  • Colour Palette is PICO-8 from Lospec
  • Music in the trailer by Patrikus Droilius
